name: Maze
description: A complex labyrinth with winding passages, representing confusion, complexity, and the challenge of finding the right path.

person: Someone with deep knowledge who can navigate complex situations
A person who creates confusion or deliberately complicates matters
creatureTrap: Creatures that excel at creating or navigating complex environments
Traps that involve multiple steps or misdirection to overcome
place: A complex dungeon or structure with multiple paths and secrets
A place where one easily becomes lost or trapped
treasure: Rewards hidden in the most difficult to reach locations
Treasures that are surrounded by complex puzzles or obstacles
situation: Complex problems that require careful navigation and patience
Overwhelming confusion where every choice seems to lead to more problems
